hanzi-su-wiki:
敵

Значения

Враг; враг, партнёр; мщение

Мнемоника

Запретный 商 человек, враг. Никаких с ним дел, только палкой 攵 бить можно.

Варианты

敌
purpleculture_pinyin:
dí
enemy; to be a match for; to rival; to resist; to withstand
враг; быть достойным соперником; соперничать; сопротивляться; противостоять

Antonyms: 友

heisig_chinese_memo: The taskmaster became my enemy for life when he smashed the antique vase holding my wife's ashes.
heisig_constituent: enemy, antique, vase, stand up, hood, old, tombstone, gravestone, church, ten, needle, mouth, taskmaster
heisig_story: Picture your most precious antique (it doesn't matter how old it really is, so long as it is the oldest thing YOU own) being knocked over by your most unlikeable taskmaster, and you have a good picture of how people make themselves enemies for life.
myStory: 攴 means 'strike' and is a variant of 攵
koohiiStory1: The taskmaster became my enemy for life when he smashed the antique vase holding my wife´s ashes.
koohiiStory2: Indiana Jones is an enemy of taskmasters in search of antique artifacts. RTK2: 　テキ　敵地　てきち(enemy territory)...　　　　　　　　　　　Pure Group:　嫡440　適441　滴442 　摘657.
jp_example_words:
敵(かたき): enemy, rival
素敵(すてき): lovely, dreamy, beautiful, great, fantastic, superb, cool, capital
匹敵(ひってき): comparing with, match, rival, equal
敵(てき): foe, enemy, rival
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Seeing a mohawk in the winter means the enemy is nearby. You are from the dreadlock tribe and the mohawk tribe is your enemy. You’re deep in the heart of battle and winter has fallen. Now is the time to take out the enemy.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture yourself holed up in a winter encampment, waiting to strike at the mohawk wearing enemies. Feel the cold around you as you scan the horizon for mohawks.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You’re kind of a techie (てき), so you have an advantage over your enemy. You’re armed with night vision goggles and other cool tech gear as well. Being a techie certainly has its advantages.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine yourself all teched out like the techie you are. Hear the beeps and boops of all the technology you have at your disposal as you search for more mohawk enemies.
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), 并, 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 十 (десять), 口 (рот), 攵 (складной стул), 立 (стоять), 滴 (капля)
Ru_trainchinese: dí: (графема) враг; выступать против; быть равным (по силе)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the old trader (啇) can still strike (攵) his enemy
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If a student sticks their tongue out at the taskmaster they will be his enemy for life.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of "攴", "啻", the original meaning is the enemy. "Shuowen": "Chou Ye. Cong Wei, wailing." "Mozi‧Seven troubles": "Seven troubles to defend the city, the enemy to the country."

" Enemy " can mean resistance and confrontation. "Fifteen Years of Zuo Zhuan-Ai Gong": "The eldest son heard it and was afraid to go down to the stone to beg and Mengwei to engulf the road."

" Enemy " can also mean equal or equal. "Sun Tzu Muse Attack": "Therefore, the method of using troops is to encircle you in ten, to attack in five, and to divide by times. The enemy can fight, and if you have less, you can escape." war."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of "攴", "啻", the original meaning is the enemy.
humanum_full_description:
從「攴」，「啻」聲，本義為敵人。《說文》：「仇也。从攴，啻聲。」《墨子‧七患》：「以七患守城，敵至國傾。」

　　「敵」可表示抵擋、對抗。《左傳‧哀公十五年》：「大子聞之，懼，下石乞、孟黶敵子路。」杜預注：「敵，當也。」

　　「敵」也可表示對等、相當。《孫子‧謀攻》：「故用兵之法，十則圍之，五則攻之，倍則分之，敵則能戰之，少則能逃之。」梅堯臣注：「勢力均則戰。」

④相當：勢均力敵。匹敵。敵手(能力相等的對手)。
⑤仇視：敵意。“諸侯敵王所愾”。

從「 攴 」，「 啻 」聲，本義為敵人。《說文》：「仇也。从攴，啻聲。」《墨子‧七患》：「以七患守城，敵至國傾。」 「 敵 」可表示抵擋、對抗。《左傳‧哀公十五年》：「大子聞之，懼，下石乞、孟黶敵子路。」杜預注：「敵，當也。」 「 敵 」也可表示對等、相當。《孫子‧謀攻》：「故用兵之法，十則圍之，五則攻之，倍則分之，敵則能戰之，少則能逃之。」梅堯臣注：「勢力均則戰。」
From the sound of " 攴", " 啻", the original meaning is the enemy. "Shuowen": "Chou Ye. Cong Wei, wailing." "Mozi‧Seven troubles": "Seven troubles to defend the city, the enemy to the country." " Enemy" can mean resistance and confrontation. "Fifteen Years of Zuo Zhuan-Ai Gong": "The eldest son heard it and was afraid to go down to the stone to beg and Mengwei to engulf the road." " Enemy" can also mean equal or equal. "Sun Tzu Muse Attack": "Therefore, the method of using troops is to encircle you in ten, to attack in five, and to divide by times. The enemy can fight, and if you have less, you can escape." war."

敵字的基本解释

敵
dí
见“敌”。

敵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dí］
［《廣韻》徒歷切，入錫，定。］
“敌1”的繁体字。“適5”的被通假字。
(1)仇敌；敌人。
(2)敌对的。
(3)抵挡；对抗。
(4)对等，相当。
(5)对；相对。
(6)通“適”。嫡系，正宗。后作“嫡”。
(7)通“適”。主；主人。
(8)通“謫”。过错。

敵字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【攴字部】　敵； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页474第48
【廣韻】徒歷切【集韻】【韻會】亭歷切，?音狄。【說文】仇也。【書·微子】相爲敵讎。　又【爾雅·釋詁】敵，當也。【疏】仇匹相當也。【易·同人】伏戎於莽，敵剛也。【左傳·文六年】敵惠敵怨，不在後嗣。　又【爾雅·釋詁】敵，匹也。【博雅】輩也。【玉篇】對也。【禮·曲禮】雖貴賤不敵。　又【增韻】拒抵也。【管子·兵法篇】明理而勝敵。　又【博雅】上也。【廣韻】主也。

暂无。

[①]［dí］
["Guangyun" cut through the calendar, enter the tin, and set. ]
The traditional characters of "敌1". "Suitable 5" was passed falsely.
(1) The enemy; the enemy.
(2) Hostile.
(3) Resistance; confrontation.
(4) Equivalent and equivalent.
(5) Yes; relative.
(6) Through "suitability". Straight line, authentic. Later as "di".
(7) Through "suitability". Master; master.
(8) Through "banning". fault.

Name meaning

dí
вм. 敌
Radicals: 啇, 夂  (mohawk, winter)
Meaning Mnemonic
Seeing a mohawk in the winter means the enemy is nearby. You are from the dreadlock tribe and the mohawk tribe is your enemy. You’re deep in the heart of battle and winter has fallen. Now is the time to take out the enemy.
Picture yourself holed up in a winter encampment, waiting to strike at the mohawk wearing enemies. Feel the cold around you as you scan the horizon for mohawks.
Reading Mnemonic
You’re kind of a techie (てき), so you have an advantage over your enemy. You’re armed with night vision goggles and other cool tech gear as well. Being a techie certainly has its advantages.
Imagine yourself all teched out like the techie you are. Hear the beeps and boops of all the technology you have at your disposal as you search for more mohawk enemies.
